scripts.build: yarn workspace @toastup/core run build && yarn workspace @toastup/react run build
scripts.test: yarn workspace @toastup/core run test && yarn workspace @toastup/react run test
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspace @toastup/core run test:coverage && yarn workspace @toastup/react run test:coverage
scripts.format: npm run format:scripts && npm run format:styles
scripts.prepare: husky install && husky set .husky/pre-commit 'npx lint-staged' && git add .husky/pre-commit
scripts.uninstall-husky: npm uninstall husky --no-save && git config --unset core.hooksPath && npx rimraf .husky
scripts.publish:core:main: cd ./packages/core && yarn npm publish --access public && cd ../..
scripts.publish:core: npm run publish:core:pre && npm run publish:core:main && npm run publish:core:post
scripts.publish:react:main: cd ./packages/react && yarn npm publish --access public && cd ../..
scripts.publish:react: npm run publish:react:pre && npm run publish:react:main && npm run publish:react:post
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:react
